title: Clg Timing
content: What is the timings for clg in ec campus?How many half days?

comments.body: Starts at 8 sharp in the morning. Classes go upto 3:15 in the noon. You usually get one half day with wednesday every week which is upto 1 pm. You get off on saturdays and sundays. There is an online class on saturday mornings. Usually 1.5-3 hours.
It seems that in sem2.. classes start at 8:45 am (even sem)
